meanings.definition: Sloping or tilted in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The slanted roof allowed rainwater to flow easily.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a slanted tree on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The slanted chair made it look like it was whispering secrets.
meanings.sent4: Her slanted smile hinted at a hidden agenda.
meanings.sent5: The slanted shadows created a mysterious atmosphere in the room.

meanings.definition: Biased or favoring a particular point of view.
meanings.sent1: The slanted news article only showed one side of the story.
meanings.sent2: Her slanted opinions influenced the group's decision.
meanings.sent3: The slanted referee seemed to always favor the home team.
meanings.sent4: His slanted view of the situation colored his judgment.
meanings.sent5: The slanted documentary presented a skewed perspective on the issue.
